pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extracts the Backbone from Graphs // An implementation of methods for extracting an unweighted unipartite graph (i.e. a backbone) from an unweighted unipartite graph, a weighted unipartite graph, the projection of an unweighted bipartite graph, or the projection of a weighted bipartite graph (Neal, 2022 doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0269137).
